structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
General Provisions Relative To Sales, Mortgages, Releases, Compromises, Etc., By Executors, Etc.

law.catch_line: Petitions For Sales By Foreign Fiduciaries; Venue
law.text: All proceedings in probate courts relative to sales by a foreign executor, administrator, guardian, conservator or trustee shall be in the county where an authenticated copy of his appointment is first filed.
